Verses: 1 oruvan Samaadhaana Paliyaip Padaikkavendumendru, Maattumandhaiyil Eduththu Seluththuvaanaagil, Adhu Kaalaiyaanaalum Sari, Pasuvaanaalum Sari, Pazhudhatriruppadhai Karththarudaiya Sannidhiyil Seluththakkadavan.

2 avan Than Paliyin Thalaimel Than Kaiyai Vaiththu, Aasarippuk Koodaaravaasalukku Munbaaga Adhaik Kollakkadavan; Appozhudhu Aaronin Kumaararaagiya Aasaariyar Adhin Raththaththaip Palipeedaththinmel Sutrilum Thelikkakkadavargal.
3 pinbu Samaadhaana Paliyile Kudalgalai Moodiya Kozhuppaiyum, Kudalgalilulla Kozhuppu Muzhuvadhaiyum,

4 irandu Kundikkaaigalaiyum, Avaigalinmel Siru Kudalgalinidaththil Irukkira Kozhuppaiyum, Kundikkaaigalodekoodak Kalleeralinmel Irukkira Javvaiyum Eduththu, Karththarukkuth Thaganapaliyaaga Seluththuvaanaaga.
5 adhai Aaronin Kumaarar Palipeedaththu Akkiniyilulla Kattaigalinmel Pottirukkum Sarvaanga Thaganapaliyinmeedhil Pottuth Thaganikkakkadavargal; Idhu Karththarukku Sugandha Vaasanaiyaana Thaganapali.
6 avan Karththarukku Samaadhaana Paliyaip Padaikkavendumendru Aattu Mandhaiyilirundhu Eduththu Seluththuvaanaagil, Adhu Aan Aanaalum Sari, Pen Aanaalum Sari, Pazhudhatriruppadhai Seluththuvaanaaga.
7 avan Aattukkuttiyaip Paliyaaga Seluththavendumaanaal, Adhaik Karththarudaiya Sannidhiyil Konduvandhu,

8 than Paliyin Thalaimel Than Kaiyai Vaiththu, Aasarippuk Koodaaraththukku Munbaaga Adhaik Kollakkadavan; Appozhudhu Aaronin Kumaarar Adhin Raththaththaip Palipeedaththinmel Sutrilum Thelikkakkadavargal.
9 pinbu Avan Samaadhaana Paliyile Adhin Kozhuppaiyum, Naduvelumbilirundhu Eduththa Muzhu Vaalaiyum, Kudalgalai Moodiya Kozhuppaiyum, Avaigalinmel Irukkira Kozhuppu Muzhuvadhaiyum,

10 irandu Kundikkaaigalaiyum, Avaigalinmel Siru Kudalgalinidaththil Irukkira Kozhuppaiyum, Kundikkaaigalodekoodak Kalleeralinmel Irukkira Javvaiyum Eduththu, Karththarukkuth Thaganapaliyaaga Seluththakkadavan.
11 adhai Aasaariyan Palipeedaththinmel Thaganikkakkadavan; Idhu Karththarukku Idum Thagana Aagaaram.
12 avan Seluththuvadhu Vellaadaayirukkumaanaal, Avan Adhai Karththarudaiya Sannidhiyil Konduvandhu,

13 adhin Thalaiyinmel Than Kaiyai Vaiththu, Aasarippuk Koodaaraththukku Munbaaga Adhaik Kollakkadavan; Appozhudhu Aaronin Kumaarar Adhin Raththaththaip Palipeedaththinmel Sutrilum Thelikkakkadavargal.
14 avan Adhile Kudalgalai Moodiya Kozhuppaiyum, Avaigalinmelirukkira Kozhuppu Muzhuvadhaiyum,

15 irandu Kundikkaaigalaiyum, Avaigalinmel Siru Kudalgalinidaththil Irukkira Kozhuppaiyum, Kundikkaaigalodekoodak Kalleeralinmel Irukkira Javvaiyum Eduththu, Karththarukkuth Thaganapaliyaaga Seluththakkadavan.
16 aasaariyan Palipeedaththinmel Avaigalaith Thaganikkakkadavan; Idhu Sugandha Vaasanaiyaana Thagana Aagaaram; Kozhuppu Muzhuvadhum Karththarudaiyadhu.
17 kozhuppaiyaavadhu Raththaththaiyaavadhu Neengal Pusikkalaagaadhu; Idhu Ungal Vaasasthalangal Engum Ungal Thalaimuraithorum Niththiya Kattalaiyaayirukkum Endru Sol Endraar.
